meanings.definition: To provide with a quality or trait
meanings.sent1: She enduing her painting with vibrant colors.
meanings.sent2: The artist enjoys enduing her artwork with emotion.
meanings.sent3: The chef enduing the dish with a burst of flavor.
meanings.sent4: His words enduing the audience with hope.
meanings.sent5: The teacher enduing her students with knowledge and inspiration.

meanings.sent1: The warm blanket enduing the baby in comfort.
meanings.sent2: The clouds enduing the sky in darkness.
meanings.sent3: The tree enduing its branches with colorful leaves.
meanings.sent4: The snow enduing the landscape in a blanket of white.
meanings.sent5: The coat enduing the wearer in warmth on a cold day.

meanings.definition: To invest or empower with a gift or talent
meanings.sent1: She enduing her team with confidence before the big game.
meanings.sent2: The mentor enduing the young artist with wisdom.
meanings.sent3: The scholarship enduing students with the opportunity to succeed.
meanings.sent4: The leader enduing his followers with a sense of purpose.
meanings.sent5: The parent enduing their child with love and support.
